languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мне тут друзья с той сторонки нашептали, что будет здорово приютить этот веник у себя. Но я вам говорю — когда с той стороны настойчиво стучатся, дверку-то лучше того, не открывать еще шире".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, мне тут друзья с той сторонки нашептали, что будет здорово приютить этот веник у себя. Но я вам говорю — когда с той стороны настойчиво стучатся, дверку-то лучше того, не открывать еще шире".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мне тут друзья с той сторонки нашептали, что будет здорово приютить этот веник у себя. Но я вам говорю — когда с той стороны настойчиво стучатся, дверку-то лучше того, не открывать еще шире".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering it would be great to shelter this here whisk broom at our place. But I say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、向こう側の友人たちが囁いているわ。このほうきをあたいたちと一緒に匿ってくれたら最高だって言っているの。でも、向こう側からノックしてきても、扉はあまり大きく開かないほうがいいわ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、向こう側の友人たちが囁いているわ。このほうきをあたいたちと一緒に匿ってくれたら最高だって言っているの。でも、向こう側からノックしてきても、扉はあまり大きく開かないほうがいいわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, mis amigos del otro lado susurran. Dicen que sería una gran idea acoger a esta mata entre nosotros. Sin embargo, también debo decir que no conviene abrir la puerta de par en par cuando llaman desde el otro lado».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, mis amigos del otro lado susurran. Dicen que sería una gran idea acoger a esta mata entre nosotros. Sin embargo, también debo decir que no conviene abrir la puerta de par en par cuando llaman desde el otro lado».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，另一边的朋友正在窃窃私语，他们说我们最好把这种东西随身带着。但在我看来，要是他们从另一边敲门，最好别把门缝开得太大。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，另一边的朋友正在窃窃私语，他们说我们最好把这种东西随身带着。但在我看来，要是他们从另一边敲门，最好别把门缝开得太大。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, mes amies les voix me disent qu'on devrait emporter cette plante pour la protéger. Personnellement, je crois qu'il vaut mieux ne pas ouvrir la porte trop grand quand ils se manifestent de l'autre côté. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, mes amies les voix me disent qu'on devrait emporter cette plante pour la protéger. Personnellement, je crois qu'il vaut mieux ne pas ouvrir la porte trop grand quand ils se manifestent de l'autre côté. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, meine Freunde von der anderen Seite flüstern. Sie sagen, es wäre wunderbar, wenn wir diesen Ginster hier bei uns unterbringen könnten. Doch ich halte es für das Beste, die Tür nicht zu weit zu öffnen, wenn sie von der anderen Seite dagegenklopfen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, meine Freunde von der anderen Seite flüstern. Sie sagen, es wäre wunderbar, wenn wir diesen Ginster hier bei uns unterbringen könnten. Doch ich halte es für das Beste, die Tür nicht zu weit zu öffnen, wenn sie von der anderen Seite dagegenklopfen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, diğer taraftaki arkadaşlarım fısıldıyor. Bu sarmaşığı da yanımıza alırsak harika olurmuş diyorlar. Gerçi onlar diğer taraftan kapıyı yumruklarken kapıyı ardına kadar açmak, pek iyi bir fikir olmayabilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, my friends from the other side are whispering. They say it would be great to shelter this here broom with us. But I will say it is best not to open the door too wide when they start knocking from the other side."
